prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that resembles a sturdy mountain with a quirky expression.
Show me a Pokemon that has a nose like a giant red triangle and a stout body.
Design a creature with a unique shape, primarily gray, and a bright red feature.
I want an imaginative take on a Pokemon that combines elements of rocks and faces.
Generate a character that has a distinctive nose and a solid, blocky form.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a rock formation with a comical, expressive face.
Imagine a Pokemon that is both sturdy like a rock and has a quirky personality.
